pages.text: We have a number of new villager professions included in this pack! Some are provided by the $(o)More Villagers$() mod, and others are from the $(o)Miniblock Traders$() datapack.

pages.title: Miniblock Traders
pages.text: As you play, you may come across "special" versions of items such as redstone, blaze powder, etc. Throw one of these items at a villager to change them to the corresponding miniblock trader. $(l)This will overwrite any trades they already have!$()

pages.title: More Villagers
pages.text: For the professions coming from $(o)More Villagers$(), you simply craft their workstation and grant the villager their profession like normal.
